entities.description: Harry is the main character of the story. He is watching Hermione and talking to Ron.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a student who is helping Harry with a potion. She is reading about Chameleon Ghouls.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a student and friend of Harry's. He is listening to Harry talk about Dobby.

entities.name: dobby
entities.description: Dobby is a house-elf who visited Harry in the middle of the night. He told Harry that the Chamber of Secrets has been opened before.

entities.name: lucius malfoy
entities.description: Lucius Malfoy is mentioned as someone who might have opened the Chamber of Secrets when he was at school.

entities.name: draco malfoy
